scenes.background: Monica looks at you, still visibly stressed. Bob leans back in his chair, arms crossed.
scenes.description: I cant believe this is happening. How do you expect me to manage all this?

options.text: Let's break it down together and see what can be prioritized.
options.analysis: You offered to collaborate and prioritize, showing strong perception and empathy, while maintaining self-regulation.

options.text: I understand it's overwhelming, but we can find a way to handle it.
options.analysis: You acknowledged her feelings and offered a solution, showing good self-regulation and social skills, but empathy could be stronger.

options.text: This needs to get done, so letâ€™s focus on solutions instead of problems.
options.analysis: You emphasized the importance of the task, showing motivation but lacked empathy and perception.
